name: White Studded Crossbody

<LI>Top flap with turn key closure
<LI>Sliver hardware
<LI>Adjustable shoulder strap

name: Cape
description:

<LI>Hand slits with hidden interior pockets
<LI>One size

name: Black Dopp Kit
description:
<LI>Travel kit to house all of your toiletries
<LI>Black leather exterior with top zipper
<LI>Zip out plaid fabric lining.  If you ever have a spill, zip out the lining and give it a wash.
<LI> 12" x 5½" x 7"

name: Brown Dopp Kit
description:
<LI>Travel kit to house all of your toiletries
<LI>Brown leather exterior with top zipper
<LI>Zip out striped fabric lining.  If you ever have a spill, zip out the lining and give it a wash.
<LI> 12" x 5½" x 7"

name: Tote
description:
<LI>Red leather tote bag with black straps
<LI>Straps have an 8" drop
<LI>Plaid lining with interior patch pockets
<LI>2 exterior pockets
<LI>13" x 13" x 5"

name: Black Satchel
description:
<LI>Made with black leather and chocolate brown pony hair zippered pockets
<LI>Removable leather and chain shoulder strap
<LI>Nickel turn lock clasp
<LI>Pink and black polka dot cotton lining with zippered pocket

name: Pale Yellow Envelope Wristlet
description:
• Measures 4½" x 6½"
  • Pale yellow lambskin leather, lime green suede lining
  • Magnetic closure
  • Removable wrist strap
  • Available with embroidered monogramming on the inside flap. If you choose the monogramming option, mention your desired initials in the 'Notes' section at checkout.
  • Contact us to order your custom bag with your choice of leather and suede
  • Custom order 3 or more clutches and receive 20% off and free monogramming - great for bridesmaids gifts!

name: TCS Alumnae Black Envelope Clutch
description:
• Black leather on black suede envelope clutch
  • Measures 11" x 6"
  • Leather exterior
  • Maroon suede lining
  • Interior zip pocket
  • Magnetic closure
  • Price includes your choice of custom monogramming. Choose initials, graduating class or personal message. Please provide your choice of monogram in the "notes" section when you check out or email me with your choice.
  • All profits will be donated to TCS

name: Green iPad Convertible Pouch
description:
• Add the strap and you have a messenger bag, remove the strap for an over-sized clutch.
  • Measures 12" x 9" which is large enough to hold an iPad.
  • Green patent leather with pearl patent pocket.
  • Zippered closure.
  • Unlined.
  • Adjustable shoulder strap.
